content: 2 when weaving in this end first pull it towards the left then weave in along slipped st edge on left side of semi circle method 2 row 24 ws slip 1 k1 psso k2 decrease ppso cut yarn and pull through last st tip pull sideways on the upper edge of semi-circle to even out the sts 3 top left semi-circle if sts were placed on holder of safetey pin move onto lh needle with rs facing join new yarn at right edge of sts = middle of heart tip if you want to make a loop for hanging using the same yarn as heart leave a long enough tail when joining new yarn next row rs k9 turn work to ws work row 18-25 method 1 or 18-24 method 2 as above for right semi-circle finishing weave in ends they don t need to be woven into more than a few sts steam lightly or soak and lay flat to dry if desired the shape can be adjusted while damp attach a thin ribbon or thread at center for hanging if desired merry little heart © heidi kirrmaier page 4 of 5 december 1 2023 abbreviations co = cast on m1l = make one left lift strand between needles onto lh needle so the right side of it is at the front then knit into the back of it m1r = make one right lift strand between needles onto lh needle so the left side of it is at the front then knit into the front of it k = knit kfb = knit into the front then knit into the back of the same st lh = left hand p = purl ppso = pass previous st over psso = pass slipped st over rh = right hand rs = right side ssk = slip 2 sts separately as if to knit then knit together through back loops st s = stitch es decrease = together ws = wrong side backward loop
